Package package01

Class CalculatorAdvanced

java.lang.Object
package01.Calculator
package01.CalculatorAdvanced
public class CalculatorAdvanced
extends Calculator
The CalculatorAdvanced program implements an application that calculates result of some advanced mathematical operations.

  • Method Details

    • calculateAdvanced

      public void calculateAdvanced​(char action) throws NumberNotInAreaException, NotSupportedOperationException
      This method is used to calculate exponential value of number or factorial of number from interval [0, 10]. Exponent can be from interval [0, 9]. Method sets result in currentValue.
      Parameters:
      action - is Double type. Can be one of number in interval [0, 10] or character '!'.
      Throws:
      NumberNotInAreaException - In case of Number not in area!
      NotSupportedOperationException - In case of Not supported operation!

    • hasCharacteristic

      public java.lang.Boolean hasCharacteristic​(char value) throws NotSupportedOperationException, NumberNotInAreaException
      This method is used to check if number is Armstrong's number or is Perfect number. Method sets result to currentValue!
      Parameters:
      value - is Double type. Can be one of characters: 'A' - for Armstrong's number check, 'P' - for Perfect number check.
      Returns:
      True if number is Armstrong's number (value = 'A') or is Perfect number (value = 'P'), otherwise false.
      Throws:
      NumberNotInAreaException - In case of Number not in area!
      NotSupportedOperationException - In case of Not supported operation!

    • armstrongNumber

      public java.lang.Boolean armstrongNumber​(int temp)
      This method is used to check if number is Armstrong's number!
      Parameters:
      temp - This is number which is checked whether it is Armstrong's number or not. It must be Integer type.
      Returns:
      Boolean type. True if number is Armstrong's number, otherwise false.

    • perfectNumber

      public java.lang.Boolean perfectNumber​(int temp)
      This method is used to check if number is Perfect number!
      Parameters:
      temp - This is number which is checked whether it is Perfect number or not. It must be Integer type.
      Returns:
      Boolean type. True if number is Perfect number, otherwise false.
